therian

Interface Operator<OPERATION extends Operation<?>>

  • Type Parameters:
    OPERATION -
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AddAllToArray, AddEntryToMap, AddToArray, AddToCollection, AddToListIterator, AssignableElementConverter, BeanCopier, BeanToMapCopier, CollectionToArray, ContainerCopier, ContainerCopier.Dynamic, ContainerCopier.ToArray, ContainerCopier.ToEnumeration, ContainerCopier.ToIterable, ContainerCopier.ToIterator, Converter, Converter.WithDynamicTarget, ConverterWrapper, ConvertingCopier, Copier, CopyingConverter, CopyingConverter.DynamicallyTyped, DefaultCopyingConverter, DefaultImmutableChecker, DefaultSizeOperator, DefaultToArrayConverter, DefaultToEnumerationConverter, DefaultToIteratorConverter, DefaultToListConverter, ELCoercionConverter, ELCoercionConverter.HandlesNoop, ElementCopier, EnumerationToIterator, EnumerationToList, EnumToNumberConverter, GenericAddAllOperator, GetArrayElementType, GetEnumerationElementType, GetIterableElementType, GetIteratorElementType, GetMapElementType, GetSingletonElementType, ImmutableChecker, IterableToEnumeration, IterableToIterator, IterableToList, IteratorToEnumeration, IteratorToList, MapCopier, MapToBeanCopier, MapToValues, NaiveConverter, NOPConverter, PropertyCopier, SizeOfCharSequence, SizeOfCollection, SizeOfIterable, SizeOfIterator, SizeOfMap

    public interface Operator<OPERATION extends Operation<?>>
    Implements an Operation. Note that a concrete Operator implementation should host no direct type variables.
    See Also:
    Operators.validateImplementation(Operator)

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  Operator.DependsOn
      Allows an Operator to specify that it depends on other Operators.
      static class  Operator.Phase
      Describes the "lifecycle", such as it is, of an Operator, in case it is convenient for a given implementation to use this as a "strategy trigger."

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean perform(TherianContext context, OPERATION operation)
      Perform the specified operation.
      boolean supports(TherianContext context, OPERATION operation)
      Learn whether an operation is supported.

    • Method Detail

      • perform

        boolean perform(TherianContext context,
              OPERATION operation)
        Perform the specified operation.
        Parameters:
        context - active
        operation - to perform
        Returns:
        whether the evaluation was successful

      • supports

        boolean supports(TherianContext context,
               OPERATION operation)
        Learn whether an operation is supported. This check can be fairly perfunctory as the evaluation of a given Operation sets an associated success status, thus just because an Operation is deemed to be "supported" does not guarantee it will be successfully evaluated.
        Parameters:
        context - active
        operation - to check
        Returns:
        true if supported
